description.value:
You’re able to bargain with large groups.

Prerequisites: Diplomacy or Intimidate 5 ranks

Benefit: When you use @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.GMkLZsN3a7YPvA03.JournalEntryPage.1tzIBDaDAO4hmX5C]{Diplomacy} to @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.GMkLZsN3a7YPvA03.JournalEntryPage.1tzIBDaDAO4hmX5C#change-attitude]{change a target’s attitude} or @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.GMkLZsN3a7YPvA03.JournalEntryPage.6fqgiVqlA7u9jS4i]{Intimidate} to @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.GMkLZsN3a7YPvA03.JournalEntryPage.6fqgiVqlA7u9jS4i#bully]{bully} a target, you can spend 1 Resolve Point to affect a number of additional creatures who can see and understand you within 100 feet equal to twice your Charisma modifier. Compare the result of your check to each target’s DC to see whether you succeed.
